author: Mary (Stellar Sidekick)
title: Teachers: Scholastic 50-Book Collections Only $54.50 Shipped (Reg. $350) – Just $1.09 Per Book
text:
Stock up the classroom! 
Through February 28th, teachers can hop on over to the Scholastic Store where they’re having a Winter Sale and offering up these highly rated 50-Book Collections for K-2 , 3-4 or 5-6 for only $50 (regularly up to $350)! Note that shipping is an additional $4.50, but that means you’re paying just $1.09 per book shipped right to your door (note that titles are subject to change based on availability).

These high-quality book collections include new favorites, treasured classics, and award-winning authors. Students at all levels will find more than one “just-right” book for independent, self-selected, sustained reading. Perfect for shared reading, too! Provide every student the books they want to read, and need to read, so that they can practice reading at every opportunity with books they love.
